Base Stat Guidelines

  • Weight; in Kg
  • Heft; comprises both the mass/weight of the item and it's awkwardness. better balance = lower heft. heft should generally be ~ weight. Unwieldy weapons (those with weight farther from the wielder such as clubs, hammers, morningstars, and greatswords) should increase heft. An exceptionally well balanced or small weapon might reduce heft below weight slightly.
  • Reach; in meters. Include arm reach (~1m for most 1-h weapons)
